required_elements: Date of breach, date of discovery, description of breach, types of PHI involved
description: Notification must describe what happened when it was discovered and what information was involved

required_elements: Steps individuals should take to protect themselves, recommended protective measures
description: Notification should inform individuals about recommended steps to mitigate potential harm

required_elements: Credit monitoring and identity theft prevention services offered, whether offered at no cost, duration of services
description: Notification must describe any offered mitigation measures and credit monitoring services

required_elements: What covered entity is doing to investigate, mitigate harm, prevent future breaches
description: Notification should describe entity's response and steps being taken

required_elements: Contact information for covered entity, phone number, email address, website
description: Notification must provide entity contact information for questions and requests for more information

required_elements: Information about HIPAA rights, how to file complaint with OCR, contact information for OCR
description: Notification should include information about privacy rights and complaint procedures

required_elements: Toll-free hotline number, website for more information, mailing address for questions
description: Notification should include multiple contact methods for individual inquiries

required_elements: Description of individuals' rights under HIPAA, how to exercise right to access, amend or receive accounting
description: Notification should educate individuals about their HIPAA privacy rights

required_elements: Information about credit freeze and fraud alert options available to individuals
description: Notification should advise individuals of available protective measures

required_elements: Date of notification letter, certification of compliance with all notification requirements
description: Notification should include administrative details confirming regulatory compliance
